PrecisAmendment to Order in Council P.C. 2004-1269 of October 26, 2004 concerning the remuneration paid to Professors Daphne Taras, Gilles Trudeau and Ms. Sherry Liang who have been appointed as Expert Advisors for the Canada Labour Code Part III Review, effective September 1, 2005.
